name: Manuk
description:
A submission for GMTK Jam 2021. Theme: Joined Together

Now is a migrating season for Manuks, a newly found bird species but already on the brink of extinction. That is because these birds can't fly for more than 5 seconds unless they are physically close to each other.

So, help them! Please!

Manuks have to stay together, especially in this trying time.

Controls: Mouse only

  • Click the balloon first to gain control of the balloon.
  • Get close to the birds to herd them close to each other until they reach their new nest.
  • Avoid electric poles.
  • You might find caged Manuks on the way, approach it to free the Manuk.

Credits:

  1. Fonts: Daniel Linssen
  2. BGMs: Kevin MacLeod
  3. Bird sounds: freesfx

Team:

  • Programmer: Noodle Eater
  • Designer & Artist: Syauqihh
